Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Raptor \Rap"tor\ (r[a^]p"t[~e]r), n. [L. raptor, from rapere to ravish. See {Rapid}.] A ravisher; a plunderer. [Obs.] [1913 Webster]
raptor n : any of numerous carnivorous birds that hunt and kill other animals [syn: {bird of prey}, {raptorial bird}]
